member.name: P:Syscom.Server.CMM.My.Resources.Resources.Culture

member.name: P:Syscom.Server.CMM.My.Resources.Resources.log4net
member.summary:
查詢類似 <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?> <log4net> <appender name="ConsoleAppender" type="log4net.Appender.ConsoleAppender"> <layout type="log4net.Layout.PatternLayout"> <conversionPattern value="%date [%thread] %-5level %logger [%ndc] - %message%newline"/> </layout> </appender>
<appender name="SyscomServerLog" type="log4net.Appender.RollingFileAppender"> <file value="C:\\Log\\syscom-server.log" /> <appendToFile value="true" /> <rollingStyle value="Composite" /> [字串的其餘部分已遭截斷]"; 的當地語系化字串。
